Hello there and thank you for visiting my blog!

I'm Davide Fornelli, an experienced technical leader currently based in Munich, Germany. My expertise revolves around leveraging AI and data science to transform businesses. I enjoy designing and implementing state-of-the-art machine learning models, driving data strategy and integration, and leading ambitious projects to successful fruition. With a strong background in AI solutions and large language models, I'm always ready to tackle complex data challenges and devise innovative solutions.

Currently, I'm making a difference as a Delivery Solutions Architect at Databricks, engaging daily in solving some of the most challenging data problems in the world.
